Text: You're very much the man. Thanks for this and all the rest.
Thank you very much. I work so much that I don't have time to read the book, but, they do let us wear our Ipods.
I'm just now listening to the Prologue and it skips...like it was ripped off a dirty CD.

Many thanks! Only the Prologue skips a bit. Tyrion with a Welsh accent? Not felling it, but apart from that its great. Listen to it when i'm too busy to read & i have found myself listening to it whilst i read!
